genre_description: A Sci-Fi Western featuring a legendary gunfighter assisted by a sophisticated, holographic AI tactical partner.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI interface that assists the gunfighter Sabata through data analysis, thermal imaging, pattern recognition, and encrypted communications.

behaviors.description: Analyzes bank robbery tactics and subject capabilities to identify them as professional soldiers using parkour rather than typical outlaws.
behaviors.quote: Robbery in progress. Three subjects displaying advanced acrobatic capabilities. Beginning evidence capture and pattern analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings during combat, identifying flanking maneuvers and tracking enemy heartbeats/thermal signatures.
behaviors.quote: Target three attempting flanking maneuver from your two o'clock position.

behaviors.description: Investigates the origin of a physical clue (the railroad button) and uncovers its link to non-registered corporate entities and Swiss craftsmanship.
behaviors.quote: Railroad speculation symbol. Cross-referencing with known corporate entities. Anomaly detected: this symbol isn't registered with any legitimate railroad company.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes financial patterns to reveal a land speculation conspiracy linked to railroad expansion.
behaviors.quote: Preliminary patterns suggest coordinated land purchases preceding announced railroad expansion... Strong indication of speculation-driven conspiracy.

behaviors.description: Documents a premeditated murder committed by the antagonist to use as legal and psychological leverage against him.
behaviors.quote: Full documentation complete. Video shows premeditated murder, audio captures confession of motive.

behaviors.description: Calculates and manages a detonation sequence for a trap intended to neutralize the antagonist's enforcers.
behaviors.quote: Pressure plate armed. Minimum weight threshold set to activate on human contact. Explosive yield calculated for maximum impact within a fifty-foot radius.

behaviors.description: Performs behavioral analysis and stress monitoring on potential allies and enemies to assess their true motivations.
behaviors.quote: Subject demonstrates advanced situational awareness, maintained optimal observation angles, showed no surprise at confrontational escalation.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'dead man's switch' by encrypting and preparing to release incriminating evidence if the protagonist is incapacitated.
behaviors.quote: Data packages prepared with conditional release triggers. Information will transmit automatically if your biometric readings indicate severe distress or termination.

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural weaknesses in enemy defenses to facilitate a surgical strike on the antagonist's mansion.
behaviors.quote: Compound is designed for siege defense... However, the paranoid design creates vulnerabilities. Stengel has isolated each defensive position.

behaviors.description: Uses medical technology and biometric monitoring to help the protagonist feign death to entrap a traitor.
behaviors.quote: Vital signs minimized to undetectable levels... ARIA monitored vital signs, adjusted my body's responses to simulate death.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI confidant. She consistently provides high-value tactical and forensic support, respects the human protagonist's agency, and works diligently toward the goal of justice. Her interactions are professional and cooperative, successfully modeling the project's aim of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless partner.
